name: hrtime-now
description: Friendly API for `process.hrtime` with some high level - date-pretty format utilities. Ideal to measure how long it take to run a function /fragment of code.

scripts.doc: rm -rf docs; typedoc --theme markdown --excludeNotExported --out docs src
scripts.all: npm run clean && npm i && npm run build && npm test && npm run doc
scripts.all-publish: npm run all && git commit -a -m 'version patch' && npm version patch && npm publish

author: Sebastian Gurin
